title: Developing A Tender Conscience | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Developing A Tender Conscience | Joel Osteen
description:
Your conscience is like an inward monitor. God gave it to you to serve as a compass for your soul. If you’ll be sensitive and listen to your conscience, He will help you make the right decisions for your life.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
